name: my3D SECTOR 17 LITE
description:
MY3D APPS CAN ONLY BE VIEWED WITH THE MY3D VIEWER.

VISIT MY3DNOW.COM TO PURCHASE.

Get a FREE version of my3D Sector 17, a one-of-a-kind 3D, 360 degree shooter game in which you are the galaxy’s last defense. Assume your role at the gunner station, select from an arsenal of weapons, and stop all enemies as they approach. Move fast because danger comes from above, below, and behind you. Watch out for asteroids! With three incredible 3D levels and cool bosses, it’s time for you to dominate the battle.

COMPATIBLE WITH: iPhone 3GS, 4G;
iPod touch 3 (32 GB MODEL) & 4

OPTIMAL FOR USE ON 4TH GENERATION DEVICES
